page.title: 17Leisure and Recreation
page.content: {SWIMMING POOL} Montrose Swimming Pool is very popular. The price is around 35p for swimmers and 20p for spectators. {SPORTS CENTRE } Montrose Sports Centre is a very modern building.It was built in 1983.Squash, badminton, 5_a_side football, basketball, table tennis, judo, trampolining and Indoor tennis. {FOOTBALL} The Vics Football Club is mostly where boys go. Lots of boys around 11 or 12 go to the Football Club "The Vics" play against other teams from different towns. {GOLF AND BOWLING} Many people young and old,play golf and bowling. There are two golf courses and four bowling greens in Montrose.
